# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="e5950-102">Vstavljanje slik v e-poštno sporočilo ali dogodek koledarja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e5950-103">Fotografije, GIF ali clipart lahko vstavite iz računalnika ali OneDrive kot slike v vrstici v Outlook.com e-poštnih sporočilih, dogodkih koledarja ali e-poštnem podpisu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e5950-104">Začnite sestavljati sporočilo ali ustvariti dogodek koledarja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="e5950-105">Izbira ikone» **Vstavi slike v vrstici «**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e5950-106">na dnu okna za sestavljanje (poleg ikone **priloži**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="e5950-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-107">).</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="e5950-108">Izberite sliko, ki jo želite vstaviti, in izberite **Odpri**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="e5950-109">Povlecite vogale, da spremenite velikost slike.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="e5950-110">Z desno tipko miške kliknite sliko, da si ogledate možnosti oblikovanja.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e5950-111">Preberite več o tem, kako [priložite datoteke v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e5950-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
